Title: French Senate Committee advises France to ban Russian LNG imports
Description: A French senate committee on climate action has advised France to ban imports of Russian LNG “as soon as possible”.
Author: JS

Title: Japan’s LNG stocks edge higher after week-earlier dip
Description: LNG stocks held by Japan’s power utilities edged higher from a week earlier amid an increase in LNG receipts and  a forecast for hotter-than-normal weather for the 30 days up to Jul. 14.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks three August LNG cargoes
Description: Thailand’s state-owned energy firm PTT seeks three LNG cargoes for delivery in August through a tender that will close on June 21.
Author: CK
